Gurossa (Artificial Intelligence computer program) and his hench-programs from taking control of the global computer network. In this future, all human activity is supported by computers, so it's possible to control the world using the network. Important note: There are two versions of the Corrector Yui manga series. This is the original one that was written and drawn by Kia Asamiya and published by Shogakkukan in Japan and does not have a release date in the States yet. A Small and Weak Nation"},{"en":"Survival Strategy Thinking with Game Theory for Save the Weak"},{"ko":"숫자로 구한다! 약소국가"},{"zh":"用数字拯救弱小国家"}],"lastChapter":"33.5","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","pt-br","id","fr"],"description":{"en":"With tensions between the neighboring country rising signaling the presence of a war soon to begin, Soalla, the princess of a small country, worried whether her own country would be able to defend itself with its weak national power. The king was bedridden and the retainers who were her last rays of hope had nothing but the antiquated motto of battle honor in mind. Not one person had a concrete proposal to protect the country, leaving Soalla to wonder if this was where Favell would fall… However, it was then that Naoki appeared before her. A \"magician,\" who would leave his name in history and possessed the power she desired to save the country.\n\n---\n**Original Web Publication:** [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF02201046010000_68/), [Nico Nico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/43120)\n\n[Original Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054886093335)","fr":"Tandis que les tensions entre pays voisins s’enveniment, faisant craindre à une guerre prochaine, Soalla, princesse du petit pays de Favell, s’inquiète de la capacité de celui-ci à se défendre, faible comme il est. Le Roi, malade, reste au lit et ses conseillers ne pensent qu’à l’honneur sur le champ de bataille. Personne n’a d’idée concrète pour sauver son pays, laissant Soalla compter les jours avant l’effrondrement de Favell… C’est à ce moment-là que Naoki apparut devant elle. Un « magicien, » qui laissa son nom dans l’histoire, possédant le pouvoir de sauver son pays.\n\n---\n**Publication originelle en ligne:** [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF02201046010000_68/), [Nico Nico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/43120)\n\n[Roman en ligne originel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054886093335)","ja":"\u003c\u003c現代の数学オタク\u003e\u003eと\u003c\u003c弱小国家のぼっち姫\u003e\u003e、時空を超えて二人は出会う――!! 魔法ナシ、異能ナシ！ 『数字』で学ぶ、戦争の勝ち方。","pt":"Com as tensões entre o país vizinho aumentando, sinalizando a presença de uma guerra que logo começaria, Soalla, a princesa de um pequeno país, preocupada se seu próprio país seria capaz de se defender com seu fraco poder nacional. O rei estava acamado e os retentores que eram seus últimos raios de esperança não tinham em mente senão o lema antiquado da honra da batalha. Nem uma pessoa tinha uma proposta concreta para proteger o país, deixando Soalla a pensar se seria aqui que Favell cairia... No entanto, foi então que Naoki apareceu diante dela. Follow Nanakusa and Manabe as they uncover the true nature of Stairway Island.  \n  \nBased on the bestselling youth mystery novel by Yutaka Kono and illustrated by Ai Uzuki."},"links":{"al":"105692","ap":"inakunare-gunjou-fragile-light-of-pistol-star","bw":"series/199097","kt":"53416","mal":"113966","mu":"148914"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}

He wants me to die for our stepsister, whom we don’t even share a drop of blood with.\n\n“For the first and last time, I ask you this.”\n\nI’ve always been miserable, and there is no exception this time. It’s my turn to abandon them first.\n\n---\nNoblewoman Hillis Inoaden has had many lives so far (seven, to be exact) but she has always been regarded the same in all of them: meek, submissive, and a pest. But in her eighth resurrection, she no longer bends to the nobles that encircle her, nor does she continue to live in the shadows of her wicked brother and stepsister. Vuole che muoia per la nostra sorellastra, con la quale non condividiamo nemmeno una goccia di sangue. \"Per la prima e l'ultima volta, ti chiedo questo.\" Sono sempre stata infelice, e questa volta non c'è eccezione. La settima volta che sono stata tradita e uccisa, ero completamente libera dai sentimenti persistenti. \"Sono contenta che tu sia spazzatura fino alla fine.\" Non sarò più influenzato dall'amore. È il mio turno di abbandonarli per primo.\n\n---\nLa nobildonna Hillis Inoaden ha avuto molte vite finora, sette, per l'esattezza, ma è sempre stata considerata la stessa in tutte: mite, sottomessa e un elemento da evitare. Ma nella sua ottava resurrezione decide di non piegarsi più ai nobili che la circondano, né continua a vivere all'ombra del suo malvagio fratello e della sorellastra impertinente. Con un potere sacro tramandato dal suo lignaggio e il titolo di Capofamiglia in eredità, parte per la sua vendetta e per cambiare il grave destino che l'attende.\n\n---\nSeason 1 artist: Mingsung\nSeason 2 artist: ZI.O\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%91%EA%B7%BC-%EB%B6%88%EA%B0%80-%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EB%94%94/2497), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56976992)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* English: [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/17114), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/solitary-lady/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%84%A1%E6%B3%95%E8%A6%AA%E8%BF%91%E7%9A%84%E5%8D%83%E9%87%91/148)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/33)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Solitary-Lady/83)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/72845)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87/202)\n\n[Official English Novel Translation](https://radishfiction.com/stories/18632)","uk":"\"Будь ласка, Хіліс, помри замість Габріель!\". Мій брат вперше щось просив. Він просив померти замість зведеної сестри, з якою у нас ні краплі спільної крові. \"Це моє перше і останнє прохання\". Я завжди була нещасна, і цього разу також. Після сьомої смерті, коли мене зрадили, сумнівних почуттів не залишилось. \"Я рада, що ти непотріб до самого кінця\". Я більше не керуватимусь почуттями. eea20834-8889-4f0b-ab8d-b89d3c1df746:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"eea20834-8889-4f0b-ab8d-b89d3c1df746","title":{"en":"Mash: Hotter than Ever!"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"マッシュ～時代より熱く～"},{"vi":"Mush - Họa sĩ thiên tài"},{"es-la":"Mash - ¡más candente que nunca!"},{"ja-ro":"Mash: Jidai yori Atsuku"}],"lastChapter":"102","description":{"en":"Mash, a boy living in Marseille, in the south of France, draws portraits every day to support his disabled father, Voss, but then an opportunity presents itself. A drawing contest is held for the city's citizens. If he wins, he will receive 10,000 francs and the chance to study at an art school in Paris. \n\nAt first, Mash gives up because he has no oil paints, brushes or other art supplies. However, with the help of his childhood friend, Sophie, he is able to acquire the tools he needs to deal with the problems that arise in his daily life.  Just when he thinks he is on track to meet the deadline, his father, Voss, who is against him becoming a painter, tears up his paintings and throws them away. \n\nThere is only one day left until the deadline, and it seems that all is not well until Mash finds an extraordinary way to complete the painting. Will he be able to enter the competition with the work he painted in one day? And will he make it to Paris, the capital of art?","es-la":"Mash, un niño que vive en Marsella, en el sur de Francia, dibuja retratos todos los días para mantener a su padre discapacitado, Voss.Pero entonces se presenta una oportunidad. Se celebra un concurso de dibujo para los ciudadanos de la ciudad. Si gana, recibirá 10.000 francos y la posibilidad de estudiar en una escuela de arte de París. \n\nAl principio, Mash se da por vencido porque no tiene pinturas al óleo, pinceles ni otros materiales de arte. Sin embargo, con la ayuda de su amiga de la infancia, Sophie, es capaz de adquirir las herramientas que necesita para hacer frente a los problemas que surgen en su vida cotidiana.  Justo cuando cree que está en camino de cumplir el plazo, su padre, Voss, que está en contra de que se convierta en pintor, rompe sus cuadros y los tira a la basura. \n\nFalta sólo falta un día para que finalice el plazo, y parece que no todo está bien hasta que Mash encuentra una forma extraordinaria de completar el cuadro. ¿Podrá presentarse al concurso con la obra que pintó en un día? ¿Y llegará a París, la capital del arte?","ja":"南仏・マルセイユに住む少年・マッシュは、日々、似顔絵を描いて身体の不自由な父親・ヴォスとの生活を支えていた。\nそのマッシュにチャンスが訪れる。市民を対象にした絵画コンテストが開催されたのだ。入選すれば1万フランという大金が手に入り、パリの美術学校で学ぶことができる。当初、マッシュは、油絵具や筆などの画材がないことで諦めていたが、幼馴染の少女・ソフィの協力で、画材道具を入手、渾身をこめて執筆活動に勤しんでいた。このままいけば締切には完成できる。そう思った矢先、画家になることに反対していた父・ヴォスが、マッシュが描いた絵画を破り捨ててしまう。締切はあと1日。万事休すだと思われたが、マッシュはあるとんでもない方法で作品を完成させた。\n1日で描いた作品で、マッシュは入選できるのか？\nそして、芸術の都・パリに行くことはできるのか？"},"links":{"al":"107818","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B09R9BYK74","bw":"series/334766","mu":"24343"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}}]}

Cô đã mất tất cả người thân, từ gia đình tới người chồng của mình trong cuộc xâm lăng của nước láng giềng. Để đảm bảo sức mạnh của mình không bị rơi vào tay của kẻ thù, Leticiel đã tự sát… hay đúng hơn đó là những gì đáng lẽ phải xảy ra. Thay vì chết, cô ấy lại tỉnh dậy trong một căn phòng lạ hoắc. \nSau một lúc lò mò xung quanh để tìm hiểu, Leticiel nhận ra rằng bằng cách nào đó cô ấy đã được chuyển sinh thành một người đang sống ở thế giới cách thế giới của cô 1000 năm sau. Dù có rất nhiều vấn đề cô ấy muốn nói, nhưng chỉ tới khi cô nhận ra sự thật về phép thuật ở cái thế giới “1000 năm sau” này… “Phù thủy điên” Leticiel tức giận vì sự yếu đuối của chính thân xác cô cũng efc921e4-4c3c-45a1-9f83-62040a612c03:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"efc921e4-4c3c-45a1-9f83-62040a612c03","title":{"en":"Head Cha La"},"relatedIdds":["40bc649f-7b49-4645-859e-6cd94136e722"],"description":{"en":"The Head Cha La series is perhaps one of the most well known Dragon Ball doujinshi series. Their books are very funny often involving alternative takes on canon scenes, or just typical slice of life moments with the Z/GT cast in various times and places. The art is very reminiscent of Toriyama, almost astoundingly so. There is a mild theme of Piccolo trying to get into Goku's pants that runs throughout the books, but it's very tame and played up for laughs. It's a gem of a collector's item for any DB doujinshi collector to have in their possession.   \n  \nThere are about 20 books in total, 13 of the original \"Head Cha La\" series, 1 with the name \"Head Cha Lo\", 4 books dealing with the GT books, and two R18 Books with Goku and Piccolo.  \n  \nUnfortunately, this series has yet to be translated into English and we hope that one day some kind translator may wish to pick this series up.  \n  \nThe scans present here will be downscaled and watermarked out of respect for the authors. If you wish to translate this series, please contact the uploader for the original HD scans."},"links":{"raw":"http://yokosis.lolipop.jp"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"b13b2a48-c720-44a9-9c77-39c9979373fb","name":{"en":"Doujinshi"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}
